column4: I have a brand new amd64 ubuntu install, and X won't work, and I never set a root password.  I didn't expect this.  What did I miss?
there is no root password in ubuntu
heh, interesting.  Ok i'll give it a shot.  I'm already in sudoers?
its been sitting at Uncompressing Unreal..... for a while now
it only took about an hour to d/l and install with gentoo, you'll have to get the linux binaries from the site i think with ubunut
I already have the ut-install.run file
im referring to the actual installation program
how long does it take to install
uncompressing for awhile?  that took my system literally 10 seconds...
it should have the 'dots' as a progress meeter thing
something must be amiss in that case
if it's uncompressing top should show it using some cpu % i woudl think
you sure the install file is valid?
